body.name: Doorbell Camera Wireless, WiFi Video Doorbell with Chime, Smart Video Doorbell Wireless, Motion Detection, HD Live Image, Battery Powered, Night Vision, Cloud Storage, 2-Way Audio
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 14 hrs 46 mins
features: 【1080P HD Video & 2-Way Audio】With full HD 1920x1080P resolution and 170° super wide-angle lens, doorbell camera provides you super clear images and video recording,let you see, hear, and speak to anyone from your phone.Camera doorbell built in microphone and speaker system, you can answer the front door no matter where you are from your smartphone with this video doorbell

【PIR Motion Detection and Night Vision】Video doorbell gets instant alerts if someone is approaching,even if they don't ring the doorbell.The wireless doorbell with motion detector will send notifications directly to your smartphone.The infrared night vision function will automatically turn on when the light becomes dark,even in the dark night,you can clearly see outside the door

【100% Wireless & Support 2.4GHz WiFi】 Camera doorbell is equipped with 2 built-in rechargeable battery and the latest wifi module chip,with up to 2-3 months of rechargeable battery life on one charge.Fast, wire-free setup,no wiring required,the WiFi coverage can reach 100ft,delivers increased installation flexibility to get the perfect 170° view from your doorbell camera (Only support 2.4GHz WiFi,5GHz WiFi is not supported)

【Cloud Storage & Multiple-User Sharing】Lifetime cloud service storage with this video doorbell.With Cloud Service, you can review,customize,save,share the footage,or have a flashback of all-day details in just a few seconds.The video can be stored in the cloud for 3 days with no storage limitation and the device will automatically overwrite previous files for loop recording. The Video Doorbell support share account with your family members.(Warm tip: cloud service storage video requires payment)

【Respond in Real-Time & IP65 Waterproof】With a high quality material shell and IP65 weatherproof design,the video doorbell is durable and can withstand severe weather such as rain and snow.When you receive a video call from your wireless doorbell camera,you can respond with pre-recorded three 10-second voice messages for a quick reply when you are busy

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The first subscription of cloud storage is free for 30 days, and subsequent video viewing needs to be charged, and the APP platform will adjust the fee, currently it is 35 US dollars for 6 months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very nice looking Camara, simple and very easy to ensemble. No wires, no WiFi. Just plug it in and it's ready. Love it 😍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't Work Half the time
reviews.reviewText: The batteries won't stay charged, customer service is no help. The sound out is fine so I have been told. But I can't understand what the person is saying back to me. Update as of April 29th it has completely crashed and I am out $50. Customer Service is horrible they don't stand behind the product they manufacture. Refund is not an option with with the company so your just out of luck with that issue. Person here, won't answer me about my situation. Don't waste your money on this. I wish I hadn't.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very easy to install and work’s awesome for price!
reviews.reviewText: As long as you totally follow the instructions, it is very simple to install. Very good picture, good alerts, chime works well once paired, and the cloud storage that you need to purchase separately as an addition is reasonably priced. The only downside is that I couldn’t get it to pair with any other household device such as Google Home other than just on my phone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Disliked the fact that I was not able to use my product when I received it. I was very disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Only thing I didn’t like was having to pay to see ur videos so I gave four stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great camera doorbell at a great price!
reviews.reviewText: Love this camera. It didn’t come with any instructions or charger box (did come with cord) but I went online and figured out that I had to remove the batteries initially and take the plastic sticker off the end of each battery before I could charge them. It took a a couple of hours but I have had it working for three weeks now and it is only gone down to 55% battery life. Also pairing the chime with the doorbell was easy. Just make sure they are close to each other when pairing. Definitely would recommend this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Just No! Not…
reviews.reviewText: Not worth the money nor the time!Need subscription plan! You’re Forced to purchase 6 month or year plan! 30 day free trial but No SD card option! I needed this simply for my office door at home. Not spending unnecessary money!Comes with a card with QRcode to scan to download manual guide setup!The battery are lithium batteries, comes with two! they’re the BigFoot of Batteries! They’re huge! Battery never charges always say 77%.Video and audio ok! Motion detection ok! Without plan live feed only last up to 3 minutes and you have to keep going back into live fee to resume viewing!Works 2.4GHz internet speed! Internet lags and keeps dropping! No customer support! Had this at least had an SD option I would’ve kept it! So I’m returning!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Charged it for 1 night had a full battery, you could see very clearly however once the battery got low it would not charge. Spoke to a rep was told leave on the charger for 12 hours and there was still no charge. Decided to leave on the charge for 2 days and the battery was still would not turn on.
